casebody.data:
DTH MEDIA CORPORATION, et al.
v.
FOLT, et al. 142PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 28, 2018 Hugh Stevens, Michael J. Tadych, Attorneys at Law, for DTH Media Corporation, et al. Stephanie A. Brennan, Matt Burke, Solicitor General Fellow, Special Deputy Attorney General, for Folt, Carol L., et al. Troy D. Shelton, Attorney at Law, for Victim Rights Organizations.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of December 2018 by Victim Rights Organizations for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of December 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
